title: CPFilms Inc 36" x 9 ft. Mirror Privacy Window Film

description: Maximum Daytime Privacy. Reduces Energy Costs. Privacy Mirror Window Film reduces up to 99% of damaging UV rays that can fade and ruin interior furnishings, flooring, and window treatments. The Mirror reflective surface gives maximum daytime privacy. Mirror Privacy Window Film is a highly reflective film that provides excellent heat rejection and privacy with a classic mirrored appearance. The film is compatible with standard 1/8 inch clear residential windows including single-pane, dual-pane, and removable storm pane windows. Width: 36 in Length: 9 ft Packaging: Roll.  Orders placed for multiple quantities of the same film will ship as one continuous roll up to 100 ft., unless otherwise requested by the buyer

title: It took us eleven years to get around to installing it, but better late than never!
